name: Round Badge with 'Healthcare Heroes' Print
desc: A durable round badge with a bold 'Healthcare Heroes' print, perfect for uniforms or casual wear. Add a touch of pride to your everyday clothing with this classic accessory.

name: Plain Tee with 'Nurses Rule the World' Logo
desc: Soft, breathable plain tee featuring the bold 'Nurses Rule the World' logo. Made from 100% cotton, this shirt ensures comfort for long shifts or casual outings.

name: Square Badge with 'Patient First' Message
desc: A square-shaped badge that carries a simple yet impactful message, 'Patient First'. It's an excellent reminder and conversation starter for healthcare professionals.

name: Comfortable Hoodie with 'Nurse Strong' Print
desc: Stay cozy with this soft, stylish hoodie featuring the 'Nurse Strong' slogan. Perfect for chilly shifts or after-work relaxation, made from a comfortable cotton-polyester blend.

name: Heart-Shaped Badge with 'Nursing is a Work of Heart' Text
desc: Show your love for nursing with this heart-shaped badge that carries the heartfelt message, 'Nursing is a Work of Heart'. Ideal for jackets, bags, and scrubs.

name: Snapback Cap with 'Nurses Rock' Embroidery
desc: This trendy snapback cap features 'Nurses Rock' in stylish embroidery. It's the perfect casual accessory for both workdays and off-duty hours.

name: Oval Badge with 'Healing Hands' Design
desc: An elegant oval badge featuring a 'Healing Hands' design that symbolizes the nurturing care of nurses. A thoughtful addition to any healthcare professional's wardrobe.

name: Graphic Tee with 'Future Nurse' Logo
desc: A graphic tee that proudly displays the 'Future Nurse' logo for aspiring healthcare professionals. This shirt is perfect for students or those entering the nursing field.

name: Star-Shaped Badge with 'Nursing Star' Design
desc: Shine like a star with this star-shaped badge that reads 'Nursing Star'. The perfect accessory to brighten your work uniform or everyday outfits.

name: Windbreaker Jacket with 'Nursing Warrior' Slogan
desc: Lightweight and water-resistant, this windbreaker jacket features the bold 'Nursing Warrior' slogan. Perfect for outdoor shifts or post-work errands.

name: Mini Badge with 'Care Giver' Text
desc: A mini badge that proudly displays the 'Care Giver' text in an elegant font. A subtle yet powerful accessory for every nurse and caregiver.

name: V-Neck Tee with 'I Save Lives' Graphic
desc: This v-neck tee features the bold graphic 'I Save Lives' across the front, made from premium cotton for all-day comfort, especially during long shifts.

name: Triangle Badge with 'RN' Design
desc: This triangle-shaped badge with an 'RN' design is perfect for registered nurses who want to wear their profession with pride.

name: Long Sleeve Shirt with 'Nurse On Duty' Logo
desc: Stay warm and stylish with this long-sleeve shirt featuring the 'Nurse On Duty' logo. Perfect for cooler weather or wearing under scrubs.

name: Heart-Shaped Badge with 'Nurse Life' Emblem
desc: This heart-shaped badge showcases the 'Nurse Life' emblem, a perfect accessory for scrubs or bags that adds a personal touch to your uniform.

name: Pullover Hoodie with 'Nurses Save Lives' Print
desc: A cozy pullover hoodie with a bold 'Nurses Save Lives' print, designed for ultimate comfort during off-duty hours or chilly days at work.

name: Badge with 'Proud Nurse' Inscription
desc: Show off your pride with this 'Proud Nurse' badge. Its sleek design makes it a great addition to any healthcare professional's accessories.

name: Baseball Cap with 'Nurse Power' Logo
desc: A sporty baseball cap with the 'Nurse Power' logo embroidered on the front. It's the perfect accessory for your off-duty look or casual outings.

name: Circular Badge with 'Emergency Nurse' Text
desc: A circular badge with the text 'Emergency Nurse' for all the frontline heroes who work tirelessly in emergency rooms. A badge that speaks volumes.

name: Fleece Jacket with 'Caring is My Superpower' Slogan
desc: This fleece jacket features the slogan 'Caring is My Superpower'. Warm and functional, it's perfect for those long, cold hospital nights.
